resource: 1003213.description=Open door warning buzzer:The open door warning buzzer sounds to alert one or more of the doors is not fully closed (with the vehicle having reached a speed of 3 mph [5 km/h]). 1003213.source=MANUAL_IMPORT 1003213.1002622.description=Open door warning buzzer:The open door warning buzzer sounds to alert one or more of the doors is not fully closed (with the vehicle having reached a speed of 3 mph [5 km/h]). 1003213.vtc=true
